questions.questionText: A, B, C sit in row. A left of B. C right of B. Order?
5 friends: A taller than B, C shorter than D, D shortest, E tallest. Who is 2nd tallest?
P, Q, R: P heavier than Q, R lighter than Q. Heaviest?
Four people in line. A before B, C after D, D before B. Who is first?
questions.explanation: A-D-B-C or A-D-C-B, A is first

questions.questionText: A, B, C scored marks. A>B, C>A. Lowest scorer?
